mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(NO) FROM EMP_COMM WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, T.* FROM ( SELECT F.NO ,C.NAME AS CATEGORY ,A.NICK ,F.TITLE ,F.CONTENT ,F.ENROLL_DATE ,F.HIT FROM EMP_COMM F full outer JOIN EMP_COMM_CATE C ON F.CATEGORY = C.NO JOIN MEMBER A ON F.NICK = A.NO WHERE F.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY F.NO DESC ) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE EMP_COMM SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, CATEGORY = #{category}, MODIFY_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE EMP_COMM SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE EMP_COMM SET HIT = HIT+1 WHERE NO = #{no}
